name: Platform Help (Demo)
description:
This is the demo for the game to show you what will be in the full version.
Scratch Cat broke it legs and needs your help to complete each level!
(Please note there might be some bugs and glitches, If so I will fix them in the full version. Also the full version text says it releases in Spring of 2022, it actually releases sometime in summer or fall, depends on school and all.)


Full Version: https://nickgamesg.itch.io/platform-help

Instructions:
Press space to enable the platform.
Use your mouse to move the platform.
Press p to pause the game.
(You can turn off the dialogue in Settings if it gets annoying each time you start the game. If you can't press anything ingame, try refreshing, changing the settings or play in fullscreen.)

Settings:
Dialogue (Shows the start dialogue, turn off if its annoying)
High Detail (Shows the game in high detail, turn off if you experience lag)

Full Version will include:
20 levels with different mechanics.
5 new songs made by me!
More settings.
Windows release
Bug fixes.
And customizable platforms!
